video.title: Arthur
video.synopsis: Based on Marc Brown's popular children's books, this Daytime Emmy-winning animated series shadows 8-year-old aardvark Arthur Read and his animal pals.

episodes.synopsis: After Arthur gives a new girl who makes up stories a second chance to tell the truth, she tells the most unbelievable story yet. But could it be true?
episodes.title: Based on a True Story, Pts. 1 & 2

episodes.synopsis: After Francine trips during a tricky soccer move she becomes an internet sensation for all the wrong reasons; Muffy makes her own wooden race car.
episodes.title: Flippity Francine / Muffy Takes the Wheel

episodes.synopsis: D.W. tries to stop Emily from appearing in a part D.W. wanted in the school play; D.W. and Emily build their dream house out of blocks.
episodes.title: All About D.W. / Blockheads

episodes.synopsis: Brain tries to prove Mr. Ratburn was right after a new interactive whiteboard corrects him; D.W. tries to get Kate to show maturity.
episodes.title: Get Smart / Baby Steps

episodes.synopsis: Worried for James' safety, D.W. and Emily try to convince him not to go to a sleepover; Tommy goes on trial for allegedly stealing a cupcake.
episodes.title: Night of the Tibble / Read and Flumberghast

episodes.synopsis: The Tough Customers give up bullying, but Molly finds it difficult; Brain starts a chess club so he can beat Los Dedos, the local chess master.
episodes.title: The Last Tough Customer / Brain's Chess Mess

episodes.synopsis: George is fired up to play for the Grebelings baseball team, and in the annual Arithmattack contest, Brain gets teamed up with Buster and Binky.
episodes.title: Baseball Blues / Brain's Biggest Blunder

episodes.synopsis: Lakewood Elementary starts a program where kids can earn points and prizes for reading, and Buster and Brain disagree on every movie they watch.
episodes.title: Buster's Book Battle / On the Buster Scale

episodes.synopsis: When Fern gets writer's block, she uses Ladonna's stories without permission; Muffy, Francine and Sue Ellen fight when they go vegetarian.
episodes.title: Fern and the Case of the Stolen Story / Sue Ellen Vegges Out

episodes.synopsis: Arthur makes fun of a Yak wool sweater, a gift from Sue Ellen's Tibetan pen pal; Arthur and his friends remember their best days ever.
episodes.title: So Funny I Forgot to Laugh / The Best Day Ever

episodes.synopsis: Pal tries to give Killer a makeover so she can beat a snobby poodle at a dog show; Pal frets when Arthur starts to favor Amigo over him.
episodes.title: Show Off / Dog's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: D.W. and Bud transform the backyard into a land full of imaginative adventures; Ladonna wants to do all of the fun fall activities in Elwood City.
episodes.title: Adventures in Budylon / Ladonna Compson: Party Animal

episodes.synopsis: Alberto has a flair for golf, but his dad's wild cheering embarrasses him; A famous comedian helps Buster get his knack for comedy back.
episodes.title: Molina's Mulligan / Buster Bombs

episodes.synopsis: Studying together tests the limits of Arthur and Buster's friendship; Arthur wins two free concert tickets, but who will he take with him?
episodes.title: Opposites Distract / Just the Ticket

episodes.synopsis: Arthur sees Buster sucking his thumb and has trouble keeping it a secret; The kids set up their own country with no rules, but is that a good idea?
episodes.title: All Thumbs / Kidonia

episodes.synopsis: Francine faces her fear of public speaking to save a local creek; Ladonna eagerly waits for her first snow day.
episodes.title: Speak Up Francine / Waiting for Snow

episodes.synopsis: Arthur turns to Nemo for help catching an elusive mouse; Ladonna, Binky and Muffy find a kite and decide to keep it, but how can they share it fairly?
episodes.title: Pets and Pests / Go Fly a Kite

episodes.synopsis: George decides to direct a film, but soon everyone else wants to take charge; George causes an accident, but Binky gets blamed.
episodes.title: The Director's Cut / Crime and Consequences

episodes.synopsis: Muffy learns firsthand how misleading reality TV shows can be; Muffy asks Buster to paint her portrait, but will his work please her?
episodes.title: Caught in the Crosswires / Framed

episodes.synopsis: Binky decides to prove once and for all that a local band is no good; A new ice cream shop could drive Brain's business into the ground.
episodes.title: Binky's Music Madness / Brain Freeze
